page.title: 03ADLINGTON PEOPLE (continued)
page.content:
cricket team, martial arts group and a canoeing club on the nearby canal. For ladies there is a Townswomens' Guild, keep-fit classes and a branch of Weight-watchers. We also have a Music and Arts Society, St.Paul's Players and the Rivington and Adlington Brass Band.We have branches of two charity organisations,Cancer Research and the Arthritis and Rheumatism Group.
We have two annual events. A village carnival which lasts from Friday to Sunday evening in August. Many societies take part and there is a procession through the streets which may stretch for two miles. Some well-known person is invited to crown the Carnival Queen and Princess.
The second event is a procession of religious witness known as Walking Day
